body: the english name of this webtoon

Yep this is known as "Shameful Vending Machine" but the english version that I can find (here and other sites) is only up to chapter 15. Artist is Mameko if anyone is interested to know. You could somewhat guess parts of the plot just from the pictures itself and here we got the complete story with the ending but only in chinese language. This was one of those where I kinda empathized some of the characters (hah not gonna spoil it). So give it a try if anyone hasn't read this work yet & enjoy.

Shameful Vending Machine?
Had read this series long times ago, just found a finale today.
